headings: Impact meaningful change through public service.
What Can You Do With a Criminal Justice Degree?
Why Earn My Criminal Justice Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: From law enforcement to the courts, our criminal justice degree program will teach you how our judicial system works. In your courses, you will learn about the agencies and organizations involved in criminal proceedings, as well as the thought processes of offenders and victims.

Our program offers two degree plan options, allowing you to tailor your degree to your interests. Our B.A. degree plan includes foreign language classes and fewer science classes, while the B.S. degree plan includes additional science classes, but no foreign language requirement. We also offer a variety of certificates to add to your list of credentials.

Our faculty stay up to date with current trends and issues throughout the criminal justice system, and many have professional experience in the field. You can collaborate with them on research projects, and they’ll work closely with you to help you achieve your career and educational goals.
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

The increasing complexity of our criminal justice system is creating a steady growth in career opportunities in law enforcement, the court and corrections systems, victim and child advocacy, education and the law.

Earning your criminal justice degree at Angelo State will prepare you for careers in law enforcement, corrections and probation/parole, crime analysis, the military, homeland security and education, or to apply to law school.
Gain hands-on experience through our available internships. Our faculty will work with you to help you find an internship that best fits your career goals and interests.

Angelo State has been designated a “Military Friendly School” and “Military Spouse Friendly School” by VIQTORY Media and G.I. Jobs magazine. We have also been named a Top 10 “Best for Vets College” by the Military Times. Our VETS Center is here to help you with your military education benefits, andTA Scholarshipsare available.
Join our Criminal Justice Student Association to develop deeper relationships with your classmates, as well as take advantage of opportunities for career services, networking and special events.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
